overview: The most ambitious skimboard movie ever undertaken. Follow the Exile Skimboard team across countries and continents as they seek out and ride the best waves on the planet. The best cameras, filming, riders and editing combine to make the finest skimboard movie that money can buy. If you aren't blown away by this movie, skimboarding is not your sport. It's that simple.
tagline: The most ambitious skimboarding video project ever undertaken.
title: Bearded
